programme.title: The Boston Massacre
programme.short_synopsis: How an engraving by Paul Revere exaggerated the 1770 riot at Boston's Customs House.
programme.medium_synopsis: How an engraving by Paul Revere exaggerated the 1770 riot at Boston's Customs House into the Boston Massacre. Plus, the unsolved mystery of why flight TWA 800 crashed in 1996.

programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
